name: Kung Fu: Remaster
description:
Kung Fu Remaster honors the legacy of the popular Atari 2600 game, Kung Fu Master. Built on the same idea and theme, Kung Fu Remaster takes up a unique art style and representation in the form of Chinese Opera.

This game was made as part of the Rapid Prototyping Development course at the Centre for Entertainment Arts.

Controls 

Use W to Jump

Use A and D to walk left or right.

Use S to crouch.

Use Spacebar to punch attack.

Use S + Spacebar to crouch attack

Use W + Spacebar to jump attack.

Team (The United Nations):

Game Programmer / Project Manager: Madhur Arora - LinkedIn

Level Designer: Eduardo Cavalcante Almeida - itch.io / LinkedIn

Game Designer / Animator: Moncef El Fadili - itch.io / LinkedIn 

2D Artist / Animator: Sida Kong - itch.io / LinkedIn

Thank you for playing, any feedback is appreciated! :-)
